text.section: In this section, "Christian Science nurse" means an individual who is registered as a Christian Science nurse in the Christian Science Journal of the Christian Science Publishing Society.

Except as specifically provided in this title, this title does not limit the right of:
An individual to practice a health occupation that the individual is authorized to practice under this article;
A Christian Science nurse to care for an individual who is ill, injured, or infirm, if the Christian Science nurse does not administer any drug or medicine; or
An unlicensed individual to perform acts of registered nursing or acts of licensed practical nursing:
While supervised by an individual who is authorized by this State to practice registered nursing or licensed practical nursing; and
If the unlicensed individual performs only acts that are in the area of responsibility of the supervisor and under the instruction of the supervisor.
